description: Transform the website from a 5/10 template-tier site to a 10/10 professional modern 2026 law firm website

tasks.title: Fix Tailwind v4 Color Configuration
tasks.description: The custom colors (primary, secondary, success, navy) are not rendering because Tailwind v4 requires CSS-first configuration using @theme blocks instead of tailwind.config.ts. Hero sections show white text on white background.
acceptance_criteria: All custom colors (primary #1E40AF, secondary #D97706, success #059669, navy #0F172A) render correctly
Hero sections display colored gradients with visible white text
bg-primary, bg-success, text-navy etc. classes work throughout the site
tasks.technical_details: Replace @theme inline with proper @theme block defining --color-primary, --color-primary-dark, --color-secondary, --color-success, --color-navy, --color-gray-light as CSS custom properties

tasks.title: Add Premium Typography System
tasks.description: Replace system fonts (Arial) with premium Google Fonts. Use Inter for body text and DM Serif Display for elegant headings to create a sophisticated law firm aesthetic.
acceptance_criteria: Inter font loaded and applied to body text
DM Serif Display loaded for headings
CSS variables --font-sans and --font-heading defined
All h1, h2, h3 elements use serif heading font
Font smoothing enabled (-webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased)
tasks.technical_details: Import fonts from next/font/google with CSS variables. Apply to body className. Create .font-heading utility class.

tasks.title: Redesign Header with Glassmorphic Effect
tasks.description: Transform the plain white header into a modern glassmorphic navigation bar with blur effect on scroll, smooth mobile menu animations, and prominent phone CTA.
acceptance_criteria: Header has backdrop-blur-md bg-white/80 effect when scrolled
Subtle border-bottom appears on scroll
Mobile menu slides in from right with backdrop overlay
Phone number styled as prominent pill button
Smooth transitions on all state changes
Logo scales appropriately on mobile
tasks.technical_details: Use useState to track scroll position. Add Framer Motion for mobile menu animation. Create backdrop overlay that closes menu on click.

tasks.title: Redesign Homepage Hero Section
tasks.description: Transform the plain gradient hero into a visually striking section with layered design, animated entrance, premium CTAs, and trust badge. This is the first impression visitors get.
acceptance_criteria: Hero has layered design with pattern overlay or subtle texture
Floating badge above headline (e.g., 'Houston's Trusted Law Firm')
Headline fades up with animation on load
Subtext and CTAs stagger in with delays
Primary CTA has gradient background with hover shine effect
Secondary CTA has white fill with border, fills on hover
Phone number is large and tappable
Optional: floating accent shapes for visual interest
tasks.technical_details: Use Framer Motion for entrance animations. Create CSS pattern overlay or use gradient mesh. Add hover:scale and transition effects to CTAs.

tasks.title: Redesign Homepage Practice Area Cards
tasks.description: Upgrade the flat white cards to premium elevated cards with depth, gradient backgrounds, interactive hover states, and animated arrows.
acceptance_criteria: Cards have subtle gradient or off-white background instead of pure white
Shadow deepens on hover (shadow-lg to shadow-xl)
Card scales slightly on hover (scale-[1.02])
Icon sits in colored circular background
Arrow icon slides right on hover
Smooth 200ms transitions on all effects
tasks.technical_details: Use group hover utilities. Add ArrowRight icon from lucide-react. Use transition-all duration-200.

tasks.title: Add Scroll-Triggered Animations Throughout
tasks.description: Create reusable animation components using Framer Motion intersection observer to fade in sections as users scroll down the page.
acceptance_criteria: AnimatedSection component triggers animation when scrolled into viewport
FadeIn component supports variants: up, down, left, right
Stagger effect for child elements
Animations respect prefers-reduced-motion
All major sections on all pages use these components
tasks.technical_details: Use framer-motion useInView hook. Create motion variants for different directions. Wrap sections with components.

tasks.title: Redesign Expungement Page (QR Landing Priority)
tasks.description: This is THE most important page - 100% of QR code traffic lands here. Must be optimized for mobile conversion with premium pricing display, trust signals, sticky CTA, and FAQ section.
acceptance_criteria: Hero uses premium serif font for impact
Credibility badge: 'Trusted by 500+ Texans' or similar
Pricing box is elevated card with premium design (shadow-2xl, gradient border)
Money-Back Guarantee badge is prominent with shield icon
Optional: strike-through 'regular' price for perceived value
3-step process section with numbered circles
FAQ accordion with common expungement questions
Sticky mobile CTA bar at bottom (fixed, visible on scroll)
Multiple CTAs throughout page
Page loads fast (<2 seconds on 3G)
tasks.technical_details: Create FAQ Accordion component with AnimatePresence. Use position:fixed for sticky CTA. Add intersection observer to show/hide sticky CTA.

tasks.title: Redesign Personal Injury Page
tasks.description: Apply consistent premium design language from homepage. Focus on the 6 practice area cards and the No Win No Fee section.
acceptance_criteria: Hero matches homepage style (pattern overlay, animations)
Practice area cards match homepage card style
No Win No Fee section is visually impactful with large shield icon
All sections have scroll-triggered fade-in animations
Page has consistent call-to-action pattern
tasks.technical_details: Reuse AnimatedSection and FadeIn components. Apply same card styling from homepage.

tasks.title: Redesign About Page with Attorney Section
tasks.description: Create professional about page with placeholder for attorney photo and bio. Design should accommodate real content when provided.
acceptance_criteria: Hero matches site-wide style
Two-column layout for attorney: photo left, bio right
Photo placeholder is elegant gradient box with silhouette icon
Bio section has clear typography hierarchy
Why Choose Us cards match homepage style
Areas served section is visually appealing
tasks.technical_details: Use CSS aspect-ratio for photo placeholder. Create person silhouette placeholder with Lucide User icon.

tasks.title: Redesign Footer
tasks.description: Upgrade footer to match premium site design with better visual hierarchy, larger logo, and consultation CTA.
acceptance_criteria: Navy background has subtle gradient or pattern
Larger logo at top of footer
Better column spacing and alignment
Social media icon placeholders (LinkedIn, etc.)
Free Consultation CTA button
Mobile layout stacks columns properly
Copyright and legal info styled subtly
tasks.technical_details: Use grid with responsive columns. Add gradient overlay to background.

tasks.title: Add Trust Signals and Social Proof Section
tasks.description: Add compelling trust signals throughout the site: badges, stats counters, and placeholder testimonial section to build credibility.
acceptance_criteria: Trust badges section with icons: 'No Win No Fee', 'Money-Back Guarantee', 'Free Consultation', '24hr Response'
Stats counter section: 'X Cases Won', 'X Years Experience', etc. (placeholder numbers)
Testimonial placeholder cards with 5-star rating display
All elements have subtle entrance animations
tasks.technical_details: Create reusable badge components. Use CSS Grid for badge layout. Star icons from Lucide.

tasks.title: Add Professional Stock Hero Images
tasks.description: Download and implement high-quality stock photos as hero backgrounds with proper overlays to maintain text readability.
acceptance_criteria: Homepage: Houston skyline or professional office image
Personal Injury: Justice scales or courtroom image
Expungement: Fresh start/sunrise imagery
About: Office or courthouse image
All images have dark gradient overlay for text contrast
Images are optimized and served via Next.js Image component
Images have proper alt text for accessibility
tasks.technical_details: Use Unsplash for free stock photos. Apply via background-image with gradient overlay. Use Next.js Image for optimization.

tasks.title: Implement Form Submission with Email Integration
tasks.description: Connect the contact form to actually send emails to the law firm using Resend email API. Add loading states and success/error feedback.
acceptance_criteria: Form submits to API route successfully
Email sent to intake@teclelaw.com with lead details
Button shows loading spinner during submission
Success message displayed after submission
Error handling with user-friendly message
Form resets after successful submission
tasks.technical_details: Install resend package. Create Resend client with API key from env. Use React state for loading/success/error. Add RESEND_API_KEY to .env.local.

tasks.title: Add Mobile-First Polish and Touch Optimizations
tasks.description: Ensure all interactive elements meet 44x44px touch target minimum. Add mobile-specific improvements like sticky CTAs and thumb-zone optimization.
acceptance_criteria: All buttons minimum 44x44px on mobile
Phone links work correctly (tel: protocol)
Email links work correctly (mailto: protocol)
No horizontal scroll on any page at 375px
Sticky mobile CTA on Expungement page
Navigation is easy to use with one thumb
Form inputs are large enough for easy typing
tasks.technical_details: Use min-h-[44px] min-w-[44px] on interactive elements. Test with Chrome DevTools device mode at 375px width.

tasks.title: Performance Optimization and Lighthouse Score
tasks.description: Optimize for Lighthouse score of 90+ across Performance, Accessibility, Best Practices, and SEO. Ensure fast loading especially on mobile.
acceptance_criteria: Lighthouse Performance score: 90+
Lighthouse Accessibility score: 90+
Lighthouse Best Practices score: 90+
Lighthouse SEO score: 90+
Page load under 2 seconds on 3G
All images have width/height to prevent layout shift
Fonts preloaded
Critical CSS inlined
tasks.technical_details: Use next/image for all images. Add proper meta tags. Ensure all interactive elements are accessible.
